events.name: Decarbonizing the transport sector
events.wd_description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.
events.description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.

events.name: Unabated growth
events.wd_description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing.
events.description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing.

events.name: Electric vehicle market demand
events.wd_description: To meet the net-zero emissions targets, the electric vehicle market demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite will increase 26-times, 6-times, 12-times, and 9-times respectively between 2021 and 2050.
events.description: To meet the net-zero emissions targets, the electric vehicle market demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite will increase 26-times, 6-times, 12-times, and 9-times respectively between 2021 and 2050.

events.name: Battery raw materials
events.wd_description: The demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite will increase 26-times, 6-times, 12-times, and 9-times respectively between 2021 and 2050.
events.description: The demand for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and graphite will increase 26-times, 6-times, 12-times, and 9-times respectively between 2021 and 2050.

events.name: Challenges in meeting demand for battery raw materials
events.wd_label: Challenges in meeting demand for battery raw materials
events.wd_description: There are diverse challenges in meeting this demand, requiring the world to embrace technological and knowledge advancements and new investments without provoking conflicts between competing goals.
events.description: There are diverse challenges in meeting this demand, requiring the world to embrace technological and knowledge advancements and new investments without provoking conflicts between competing goals.

events.name: New investments

events.name: Conclusion
events.wd_description: Decarbonizing the transport sector requires meeting demand for battery raw materials, which has diverse challenges and technological, knowledge, and new investments needed.
events.description: Decarbonizing the transport sector requires meeting demand for battery raw materials, which has diverse challenges and technological, knowledge, and new investments needed.
